title: Ohmwrecker, how to balance it.
body:
[old]Ohmwrecker {{item:3056}} (build from {{item:3067}} + {{item:2053}} )
Stats
+50 armor
+10% cooldown reduction
+300 health
+150% base health regeneration
Cost: 2650g (950g)

Passive UNIQUE – POINT RUNNER: Builds up to 20% bonus movement speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.

Active UNIQUE: Targets an enemy turret to prevent it from attacking for 3 seconds (120 second cooldown). This effect cannot be used against the same tower more than once every 8 seconds.

My idea.

[new]Ohmwrecker {{item:3056}} (build from {{item:3105}} + {{item:3067}} )

Stats
+40 armor
+40 magic resist
+10% cooldown reduction
+300 health
Cost: 2900g (1000g)/2800g (900g) {I don´t know if 2900 or 2800 is the right price to pay}

Active UNIQUE: Targets an enemy turret to prevent it from attacking for 3 seconds (120 second cooldown). This effect cannot be used against the same tower more than once every 8 seconds.

replies.body: Think I would be disappointed if point runner wasn't on it.
It's just a bad item that no one builds. There are so many items that are just better.
